job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Job Summary
Our Client is seeking a data scientist to join a newly created team. This individual will be modeling complex business problems, discover key insights, and identify opportunities; in order to accomplish this, an academic and practical knowledge of applying statistical, algorithmic, mathematical, and technological techniques is paramount. The ideal candidate will have 3-5 years of experience, preferably in an omni channel environment.
Primary Responsibilities
Collaborate internally and cross-divisionally to formulate analytical applications that help solve business problems
Experience building and delivering complex systems that leverage various machine learning algorithms
Work with large and complex financial data sets.
Active involvement in R&D efforts to enable analysis, data modeling, product development, and meaningful insights relevant to the enterprise’s domains
Qualifications
M.S. or higher in a quantitative field such as Computer Science, Statistics or Mathematics
3+ years of Data Science experience, with expertise in machine learning and statistical modeling
Strong written & verbal communication and presentation skills, with experience crafting a compelling narrative supported by data
